entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Westlock
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:17 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:17 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:17 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
